title: Giant's Kitchen Adventure #43
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Giant's Pantry Shelf
rooms.description: You find yourself on an enormous wooden shelf in a giant's pantry. Massive jars of preserves tower above you like buildings. A huge sack of flour creates a mountain to your left. The air smells of cinnamon and dried herbs. Far below, you can see the kitchen floor. A gap between jars leads east toward the kitchen counter.

items.name: giant flour sack
items.description: A massive burlap sack with 'GIANT'S BEST FLOUR - Est. 1847' printed on it

items.name: small brass key
items.description: A tiny brass key that must have fallen from somewhere

items.name: wooden spice rack
items.description: A rack holding enormous spice jars, each the size of a barrel to you. It has three compartments.

items.name: giant's recipe card
items.description: A stained recipe card written in enormous letters
items.text: GIANT GROK'S FAMOUS STEW - Family recipe since 1847. Ingredients: 500 potatoes, 200 carrots, 100 onions. Cook in the great cauldron on the stove. Grok always says: the best meals are made on the stove, and the secret ingredient is kept in the locked cupboard!

items.name: tarnished silver key
items.description: A silver key with a carrot symbol engraved on it

items.name: enormous preserve jar
items.description: A glass jar filled with preserved fruits, sealed with a brass lock

items.name: handwritten note
items.description: A note tucked inside the preserve jar
items.text: Reminder to self: Giant Grok keeps forgetting where things are! The stove is where all the cooking happens. The cupboard holds the secret ingredients. And remember - you're just a tiny mouse trying to escape this kitchen!

items.name: shelf edge
items.description: The edge of the shelf where a wooden plank bridges to the kitchen counter

rooms.name: Giant's Kitchen Counter
rooms.description: You've reached the vast expanse of the kitchen counter. A massive cutting board serves as a platform. Enormous knives stick out of a knife block like steel towers. A giant cookbook lies open, and a locked cupboard is built into the wall. The giant's stove dominates one side with its huge burners. A small crack in the wall to the north might lead to safety.

items.name: massive cutting board
items.description: A wooden cutting board scarred with knife marks, each groove deep enough to hide in

items.name: carrot scrap
items.description: A piece of carrot that fell during the giant's cooking

items.name: giant's cookbook
items.description: An enormous cookbook opened to a well-worn page
items.text: GIANT GROK'S COOKBOOK - Page 347: 'My favorite cooking spot is the stove - that's where the magic happens! I keep my secret spice blend locked in the cupboard. The combination is the number of ingredients in my famous stew recipe: potatoes, carrots, and onions combined!'

items.name: knife block
items.description: A wooden block holding several enormous knives

items.name: small copper key
items.description: A copper key wedged behind the knife block

items.name: locked wall cupboard
items.description: A cupboard built into the wall with a silver lock shaped like a carrot

items.name: secret spice blend
items.description: A small pouch of the giant's secret spices

items.name: old mouse note
items.description: A tiny note written by another mouse who escaped
items.text: If you're reading this, you're trying to escape too! I made it to the mouse hole in the wall. To get through, you need to answer the giant's security questions. Remember: the giant's name is Grok, he cooks on the stove, and you're a mouse - never forget what you are!

items.name: giant's stove
items.description: An enormous cast-iron stove with multiple burners. A great cauldron sits on one burner.
items.text: The stove is Giant Grok's pride and joy. A plaque on the front reads: 'Where Giant Grok creates his legendary meals. The stove is the heart of every kitchen!'

items.name: crack in the wall
items.description: A small opening in the wall that looks like it leads to a mouse hole. A tiny door with three questions blocks the entrance.

password_questions.question: What is the giant's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the recipe card and cookbook for the giant's name

password_questions.question: Where does the giant cook his meals?
password_questions.hint: Multiple notes mention where the cooking happens

password_questions.question: What are you?
password_questions.hint: The pantry note and escape note remind you of your true nature

rooms.name: Safe Mouse Hole
rooms.description: You've made it to safety! A cozy mouse hole hidden in the wall, far from the giant's reach. Soft nest materials line the floor, and you can see daylight streaming in from a tunnel that leads outside. The sounds of the giant's kitchen are muffled and distant now. You're finally free!

items.name: soft nesting materials
items.description: Comfortable bedding made from cloth scraps and dried grass

items.name: stored food
items.description: A small cache of seeds and crumbs - provisions for your journey

items.name: tunnel to outside
items.description: A narrow tunnel leading to freedom and the outside world

rooms.win_message: Success! You've escaped the Giant's Kitchen and reached the safety of the mouse hole! Through clever puzzle-solving and careful exploration, you navigated the dangerous world of Giant Grok's kitchen and found your way to freedom. The tunnel ahead leads to the outside world where you can live safely. You win!
